sect2.title: 1. Toolchain
sect2.para: Before compiling make sure you have all the tools installed.

listitem.para: To install the dependencies, this guide will use Homebrew which has an installation guide on their project page.
This project uses CMake to generate the makefiles. Install it with brew install cmake.

sect2.title: 3. Build Source Code
sect2.para: Replace the number after -j with a number suitable for your setup, usually the same as the number of cores on your machine. cmake will fetch any dependencies that are required for you and ensure they are compiled alongside the library.

sect2.title: 5. Installation to a Different Directory
sect2.para: If you want to install the library, its dependencies, and header files to a different directory, specify this directory when running cmake:
Then once the build is complete, run sudo make install to install to the location you specified.
